name: node-quick-start-server
description: This project is about a quick started Nodejs(Express) Porject, use Sequelize as the ORM, and the MySQL as the database manage system
author: LXHFIGHT

scripts.restartProd: forever stopall && export NODE_ENV=production && export PORT=8080 && forever -o /var/log/node-server-console.log -e /var/log/node-server-error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.startProd: export NODE_ENV=production && export PORT=8080 && forever -o /var/log/node-server-console.log -e /var/log/node-server-error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.startProdCmd: set NODE_ENV=production && set PORT=8080 && forever -a -l /logfile.log  -o /console.log -e /error.log start ./bin/www
